======Sets radiation leak of the buzzer.======
= Description =

Controls buzzer radiation leak to hurt marine when buzzer has attacked. If enabled, settings on [[asw_radiation_leak_damage.wiki|asw_radiation_leak_damage]], [[asw_radiation_leak_damage_interval.wiki|asw_radiation_leak_damage_interval]] and [[asw_radiation_leak_damage_boxwidth.wiki|asw_radiation_leak_damage_boxwidth]] are included.
